scripts.generate:esbuild-options:build: pnpx typescript-json-schema node_modules/esbuild/lib/main.d.ts BuildOptions -o libs/nx-esbuild/src/executors/build/schema.json && pnpx json -I -f libs/nx-esbuild/src/executors/build/schema.json -e 'this.cli="nx"' && pnpx json -I -f libs/nx-esbuild/src/executors/build/schema.json -e 'this.title="ESBuild Build Executor"'
scripts.generate:esbuild-options:serve: pnpx typescript-json-schema node_modules/esbuild/lib/main.d.ts BuildOptions -o libs/nx-esbuild/src/executors/serve/schema.json && pnpx json -I -f libs/nx-esbuild/src/executors/serve/schema.json -e 'this.cli="nx"' && pnpx json -I -f libs/nx-esbuild/src/executors/serve/schema.json -e 'this.title="ESBuild Serve Executor"'
scripts.~~~NOTE~~~: entryPoints and watch dont work properly and need manual changes -- see 44808fb
scripts.generate:esbuild-options: pnpm run generate:esbuild-options:build && pnpm run generate:esbuild-options:serve
